key_features: Hexagonal Shape Keeps Dumbbells in Place
ai_description: A pair of vibrant green dumbbells with a matte neoprene coating, featuring white 'KAKSS' and '3 KG' branding on the hexagonal ends. The promotional image shows the dumbbells being used in various exercises, highlighting their non-slip textured grip. One image reveals the construction with a cutaway showing the dark grey metal core beneath the durable pink coating. The hexagonal design prevents rolling on flat surfaces, and the dumbbells are presented on clean white backgrounds in professional studio shots.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts and home gym users
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Pair Green Hex Dumbbell Weights 3 kg & 3 kg
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
